name: Pizza Snake
description:
PIZZA SNAKE is a FUN and CHALLENGING game for all audiences.

You control the snake to eat as many pizas as you can.

Each pizza gives you points. With points you get stars. There are 5 stars per level.

Pizza Snake has 8 levels* and one difficulty level: Normal (Pizza Snake PRO has 9 levels**, exclusive level - Space!, and 4 difficulty levels: Easy, Normal, Hard and PRO).

To finish the game you must collect ALL the stars ⭐️.

3... 2.. 1. Pizza Snake !!!
